comments.body:
Suggestions
* Add this to the op.allocated array as well
* if op.allocated is non-empty, take the last entry and add 1
* 0 is a special port number. Maybe start at something around 2^15.
Actually, is it even possible to cause this function to be called more than once when creating a service? If so we should test it, if not the second suggestion is probably not necessary.
It is possible, I'll add a test case for this
